data.title: Eileen A. McArdle Obituary 2014
data.meta_description: Eileen A. McArdle, 70, of Ossining, NY died March 7, 2014 at her residence. She was born on Feb 22, 1944 to Laurence and Delia (McCarthy) McArdle in New York, NY.  Eileen retire...
data.text:
Eileen A. McArdle, 70, of Ossining, NY died March 7, 2014 at her residence. She was born on Feb 22, 1944 to Laurence and Delia (McCarthy) McArdle in New York, NY. Eileen retired from the Girl Scouts of America. After retirement, she enjoyed traveling and volunteering at Phelps Memorial Hospital in the gift shop. She is pre-deceased by her sisters Maureen O'Boyle and Alice Moffat, and the love of her life Billy Lynch. She is survived by her brothers-in-law Michael Moffatt and John A O'Boyle. and her nieces and nephews Maureen, Michael, Marianne, Joanne, Sean, Eileen and Laura. Reposing Hawthorne Funeral Home from 3-7 pm (Today). Funeral mass Saint Augustine's Church, Ossining, NY on Monday, 10 AM. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY.

Born in New York, New York on Feb. 22, 1944

Departed on Mar. 7, 2014 and resided in Ossining, NY.

Visitation: Sunday, Mar. 9, 2014

3:00 pm - 7:00 pm

Mass: Monday, Mar. 10, 2014

10:00 am - 10:45 am

Cemetery: Gate of Heaven Cemetery
